item.title: Large yellow box required No Parking, 30th December
item.description:
Entrance to Tent Peg Lane Car Park and access to UKPN regularly blocked by parked cars. As UKPN site has Strategic Importance and car park provides Emergency Access to Network Rail Property at Petts Wood Junction in event of train crash etc suggest existing small area of worn yellow box be increased in size to encompass 3 yellow posts to UKPN site, whole width of car park entrance and extending back to boundary.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tent Peg Lane, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves mixed with trash, 30th December
item.description:
On red lion Lane next to the military academy’s large iron Gate is lots of leaves. Because the college is nearby kids throw their litter into the leaves and it just looks awful. I’ve picked up the litter many times myself but I would much prefer if there was a bin easily accessible and someone who can clean up the leaves regularly to keep the Street tidy please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Garrison Close, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Slabs, 30th December
item.description:
The problem reported on 8597470 is being made worse by cars driving on the pavement as they are using Felton Lea as a rat run/race track while trying to avoid Tyron Way because of the shut High Street because of roadworks. This is a residential street with young children who live either side of it, a child will get hit and seriously injured or killed if this is not quickly rectified.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Felton Lea, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
